•New traps : Tesla, traps
•Daily quests added
•Invite your friends and earn Prisms!
•Lower part of the Ranking table now visible
•Weather effects
•Facebook
•GameCenter friends + ranking
•Logou

Thank you for downloading Tactile Wars! Your enthusiastic and constructive feedback is helping us to improve the game more and more!
Many features are in development and we count on your support.

- The Color War is on its way, and a new matchma

Thank you for downloading Tactile Wars. Your feedback is very useful in terms of improving the game and we are going to continue developing more content for future updates.

This update contains

•4 new mercenaries
•3 major revamps of exist

Happy New Year, General!

To kick off a color-packed new year, sign up for the color war starting now:

•Battle the other colors and lead your own color to the top of the leaderboard
•Get epic rewards each week depending on your color’s ran

4 000 000 players are now participating to the color war. To thank you for your support, here is a brand new update which will improve your color war experience.

- New bonuses were added (a random one each 6 hours and a support one to encourage the

Are you sick of being a pigment among others in a paint bucket ? Unlock awesome skins to customize your army and unleash the powers of Fashion on the battlefield.

Alien, Witch, Mini Tank, Robot or ... Pig ?!? Collect 12 different skins and defeat

Mercenaries renting feature: Play with the best mercenary you don’t own for one combat
New color changing item: You eventually don’t like Yellow ? Your color is stuck at the end of the ladder ? Change your camp (no, no, it’s not treason…) !
Territo
Bug-fixes and enhancements of the previous version.

- New maximum level : 100
- Your soldiers' power will increase when you level up
- It's now faster to level up
- New mechanic with keys giving you more rewards

- It is now possible to win gold at the end of a fight by watching a video without using keys
- All colors can now get the 100 gold at the start of the game
- Fix some purchase problem
